features: Bluetooth 5.0 and Microsoft Swift Pair technology let you connect this Bluetooth mouse conveniently and pair effortlessly with up to two devices at once and quickly switch between them with the push of a button
The blue optical sensor in the wireless computer mouse allows you to work on almost any surface
Get more done with revolutionary, distraction-free silent buttons, and on-the-fly adjustable DPI controls
The Lenovo 600 Bluetooth Silent Mouse is sculpted to be comfortable to rest your palm on
Compact, portable wireless Bluetooth mouse has a low-profile, minimalist design that makes it easy to carry and fit into pockets without bulging
body.description: Slim, minimalist, and sculpted for comfort, the Lenovo 600 Bluetooth® Silent Mouse takes a well-worn concept and turns it on its head, delivering a productivity device that doesn't get in the way of the busy professionals who use it. This Bluetooth® mouse is compact, portable, and functional, with silent mouse buttons and dongle-free connectivity via Bluetooth® 5.0 with Microsoft Swift Pair. The low-profile design makes it easy to slip into the pocket of your computer bag without bulging, so you can carry it with you anywhere. The blue optical sensor lets you work on almost any surface, while the silent buttons eliminate any distraction or disturbance. Plus, this wireless mouse lets you effortlessly pair with up to two devices at once and quickly switch between them with the push of a button.Performance Specifications:Sensor: Blue Optical SensorDPI Resolution: 3-level Adjustable (800, 1600, 2400) Scrolling: 2-way Scroll WheelNumber of Buttons: 4 (Left Click, Right Click, Scroll Click, DPI Switch) Special Features: Silent ButtonsConnectivity: Bluetooth® 5.0*Quick Pairing: Supports Swift PairOn-Off SwitchBattery: 1 x AA BatteryBattery Life: Up to 12 Months* Can connect up to 2 devices.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 5,307 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Mouse That Works With You, Not Against You The Lenovo 600 Bluetooth Silent Mouse takes a well-worn concept and turns it on its head, delivering a productivity device that doesn’t get in the way of the busy professionals who use it. It’s compact, portable, and functional, with silent mouse buttons and dongle-free connectivity via Bluetooth 5.0 with Microsoft Swift Pair.

Work Comfortably The Lenovo 600 Bluetooth Silent Mouse is sculpted to be comfortable to rest your palm on, with a low-profile, minimalist design that makes the mouse easy to carry and fit into pockets without bulging.

Get More Done Take your productivity to the max with a blue optical sensor that allows you to work on almost any surface, revolutionary, distraction-free silent buttons, and on-the-fly adjustable DPI controls.
Connect Conveniently Effortlessly pair with up to two devices at once and quickly switch between them with the push of a button, thanks to Bluetooth 5.0 and Microsoft Swift Pair technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s not totally silent but noticeably quieter than a standard mouse. Response is as quick as a wired mouse without the hassle of a wire. Quick change to multiple devices is a nice feature as well. Quick setup. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're looking for a mouse, this is IT!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to pair with multiple devices (and a handy switch under the mouse for even faster switching). Extremely lightweight, easy to use, and silent!!! Very sleek and looks lovely on my setup, it has a silicon/rubber-ish band rounding the base which provides a nice grip. If you want something nice that works perfectly, this is it. No dongle required as it connects via Bluetooth (and is easily recognizable via Microsoft Swift pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact Bluetooth mouse for a good price, but it’s no Cadillac.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve got an M1 MacBook Air, and didn’t want to drop big $$ for an Apple Magic Mouse. I also wanted something compact other than a Logitech Pebble. The reviews on this were pretty good, and it was less than $20, so I decided to give it a shot.When I unboxed it, I was a bit disappointed with the cheap feeling plastic and the grey finish. It’s a decent quality mouse, but it looks and feels a bit cheap. The grip is more ergonomic than and Apple mouse or Pebble, but it’s not very comfy to use for hours on end.Bluetooth paired up effortlessly and had no issues. It is one of the quietest clicking devices I’ve ever used, and the battery life seems very good.I wanted a Logitech Pebble when I bought this, but had a trip coming up and needed a mouse in a day, and couldn’t get the Pebble in time, so tried this. It works great, it’s compact, it’s quiet. But it feels cheap compared to the Pebble. This mouse should do just fine for what I need it for, and I’m okay with it. If I had to choose between this and the Logitech, I’d pick the Logitech, but ONLY on the finish and seeming better quality plastic. That’s it. This is a good mouse. It’s Bluetooth, it’s as cheap as Bluetooth mice go, and it works as designed. I’d recommend it for that alone.One important thing - this is a compact mouse. If you’re working on this mouse all day every day, get a regular mouse. The ergonomics are so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good one for heavy use
reviews.reviewText: Good mouse that connects using Bluetooth. Silent and easy to connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set-up
reviews.reviewText: I just took it out of the box, inserted the battery, turned on Bluetooth on my computer, and pressed the button. It couldn't be easier. It works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good compact size and easy to pair
reviews.reviewText: I love that it’s very easy to pair to 2 devices. It’s slim and feels very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse, connects with my phone
reviews.reviewText: I'm super happy with this mouse. I like having a Bluetooth mouse that connects to my phone, but some just don't like to work with a phone. This mouse connected almost instantly with my Pixel 7a, so I'm super happy. There's also a button on the top that lets you pick from 3 different cursor speeds, which is handy because I don't know how I would change that from a phone instead of a laptop. Really easy to set up, and comes with a battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024

reviews.reviewText: el producto llego a tiempo.el mouse funciona correctamente sin nada de problemas para conectar a mi lap, aun no uso la opción de dos dispositivos.es pequeño no se recomienda a manos grandes, pero muy útil para trabajar pocas horas con el.no recomiendo para sesiones largas de juego.Muy satisfecho con el producto en general.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lenovo 600 - Eine Geräuschlose Bluetooth-Maus mit Klasse
reviews.reviewText: Die Lenovo 600 Geräuschlose Bluetooth-Maus erweist sich als ein optimaler Begleiter für meinen Laptop. Die schlichte, aber ansprechende Optik fügt sich nahtlos in mein Setup ein, während die ergonomische Form dafür sorgt, dass die Maus angenehm in der Hand liegt.Die Geräuschlosigkeit dieser Maus ist ein echtes Highlight, besonders wenn man in einer ruhigen Umgebung arbeitet. Die präzise Reaktion der Maus beeindruckt mich ebenfalls. Die Bewegungen werden prompt und ohne Verzögerung auf dem Bildschirm umgesetzt, was die Effizienz meiner Arbeit deutlich verbessert.Die Lenovo 600 Bluetooth-Maus ermöglicht eine einfache Verbindung mit meinem Laptop, ohne unnötige Kabel. Dies ist besonders praktisch, wenn ich unterwegs bin oder meinen Arbeitsbereich ordentlich halten möchte.Insgesamt bin ich mit der Lenovo 600 Bluetooth-Maus äußerst zufrieden. Sie vereint eine dezente Ästhetik mit praktischen Funktionen und bietet eine reibungslose Leistung. Für alle, die nach einer zuverlässigen, geräuschlosen Bluetooth-Maus suchen, ist die Lenovo 600 definitiv eine Überlegung wert.

This is a Bluetooth mouse.. works well with my Mac book pro and windows laptop. I can connect with two devices simultaneously and can switch between devices with a switch at bottom. Nice colour. Sleek design, handy and no nonsense mice.
Sans fil et sans dongle c'est facile à utiliser.
Comodo silenzioso e si connette al volo!!!
